name: return-style
description: Non-intrusively convert the return value of any function or promise into the style that the user needs.
author: BlackGlory <woshenmedoubuzhidao@blackglory.me>

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn bundle
scripts.build:es2015: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --target es2015 --outDir lib/es2015 && tscpaths -p tsconfig.build.json -s ./src -o ./lib/es2015
scripts.build:es2018: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --target es2018 --outDir lib/es2018 && tscpaths -p tsconfig.build.json -s ./src -o ./lib/es2018
